name: Bound (itch) (I_Am_Penguin, kumroDev)
description:
Bound - This game was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam in a time span of two days.

This game features two squares that have to work together to find the exit while being in the precarious situation of being bound together with a sharp rope so be careful not to get the rope caught on something!

Control both characters at the same time using the Arrow Keys and the WASD keys to reach both exits at the same time without getting the rope caught on obstacles. 

I_Am_Penguin (Art)

https://i-am-penguin.itch.io/

Kunro_Dev (Coding, Music, Level Design)

https://kumro-potash.itch.io/
